bibl.title: Hawara in the Graeco-Roman Period.
bibl.note: Case study within the "Fayum Villages Project" (Katholieke Universiteit Leuven). - [Introduction.] - I. The sources: 1. Archaeological documentation; - 2. Literary texts; - 3. Inscriptions; - 4. Papyri. - II. The living and the dead. - Conclusion. - Pp. 333-344: Bibliography.

bibl.title: New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005

bibl.seg: UYTTERHOEVEN Inge, Hawara in the Graeco-Roman Period.

Mario CAPASSO and Paola DAVOLI (Edd.), New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005 = Papyrologica Lupiensia. 14/2005 (Galatina, 2007) pp. 311-344, 7 figg., 1 plan.

Case study within the "Fayum Villages Project" (Katholieke Universiteit Leuven). - [Introduction.] - I. The sources: 1. Archaeological documentation; - 2. Literary texts; - 3. Inscriptions; - 4. Papyri. - II. The living and the dead. - Conclusion. - Pp. 333-344: Bibliography.
